summary: Project includes an admin login; current focus is fixing the issue where the admin password update does not take effect (login shows "Invalid admin password" even after setting it to JATINSHARMA2580).
architectural_notes: Admin password appears to be managed/validated in the backend; password update must propagate to the auth check used by admin login.
known_issues: Admin login rejects password JATINSHARMA2580 with "Invalid admin password"; backend admin password update likely not applied.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the backend admin password so that the Admin Login accepts the exact password `JATINSHARMA2580` and no longer rejects it as invalid.
Ensure the admin password change persists correctly across upgrades for already-deployed canisters (i.e., upgrading the canister must not keep/reset the admin password to the old value).

projectName: Fix admin login by updating backend admin password to JATINSHARMA2580
